issues.note: Raw data has two-word name 'Horse' 'Art', rendered correctly as 'Horse Art'

result.summary: Data validation PASSED. All 26 Confederate units/leaders and 43 Union units/leaders correctly transferred from raw tables to DOM snapshot. Unit counts match exactly (Confederate: 18 units + 8 leaders = 26; Union: 34 units + 9 leaders = 43). All hex locations, manpower values, footnote symbols, and location parentheticals preserved correctly. Leaders properly separated into leaders array. Multi-part location names (Orange Court House → 'Orange Ct Hse', Flat Run Church → 'Flat Run Ch', etc.) abbreviated as expected formatting transformation.
